course_info.Course Title: Storytelling and Storyboarding with Generative AI
Learning Outcomes: LO1: Use generative AI techniques to develop compelling script elements enriched with narrative structure and creative storytelling.
LO2: Identify effective prompt terms and narrative components to enhance AI-generated storyboards for visual storytelling.
LO3: Utilise generative AI tools to refine video scripts for clarity, tone, and narrative consistency.
LO4: Analyse generative AI outputs for ethical issues, bias, and copyright risks, applying appropriate corrective actions.
course_info.TSC Title: AI Content Generation for Script Development

analyst_responses.What are the performance gaps in the ind: Ethical considerations in AI-generated content are often overlooked, leading to issues such as bias and copyright infringement. The industry lacks comprehensive strategies to address these ethical challenges, which can undermine the credibility and legality of AI-generated works.
analyst_responses.Why do you think this WSQ course will ad: This course emphasizes the importance of ethics in AI content creation, providing strategies to identify and correct bias and avoid copyright risks. By fostering an understanding of ethical practices, participants can produce AI-generated content that is both responsible and compliant with legal standards, enhancing the industry's integrity.
